name: channel
question: In what channel should I run this?

name: whenToAsk
question: When should I ask each person about their status? (ie. 9am)

name: whenToDisplaySummary
question: When should I display everyone's status for others to see? (ie. 9:55am if the meeting is at 10am)

name: whenToRemind
question: When should I remind anyone who hasn't answered the questions to do so now? (ie. if everyone's status is being sent out at 9:55am, remind at 9:45am)
